description:
The crew from Good Company (OSCON’s fab Audio/visual team) is hosting the 2nd “Good Rockin’ Tonight OSCON Show” a couple great sets with great players. Come on, let’s make some music, dance, sing and raise the roof!

Whether you play jazz, rock, blues, pop, or whatever the case may be, come along and meet friends or sit in and play with the killer GCC band.

Everyone is friendly. You won’t want to sit down. And we will have lots of stuff to play (and charts!) See you there!
title: Music Jam
